name: Akin Vol 2
description: Once again, you only have to draw one continuous line.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 1GHz processor Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 3D graphics card with 512Mb DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 60 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 2GHz Dual Core processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 3D graphics card with 1Gb DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 60 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
